product_name: Teko Light Cushion Mini Crew Socks - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The women-specific Teko Light Cushion Mini Crew socks provide light cushioning, plenty of ventilation and a close fit-perfect for keeping your feet comfortable in hot, humid weather. Fabric blend of recycled polyester, nylon and spandex is lightweight, moisture-wicking and quick-drying. Light cushioning at heel and forefoot protects against impact. Comfort stretch zones at arches and instep provide support and extra ventilation. Seamless toes reduce chafing and irritation. Special buy.
short_description: The women-specific Teko Light Cushion Mini Crew socks provide light cushioning, plenty of ventilation and a close fit-perfect for keeping your feet comfortable in hot, humid weather.
